    • Method Detail

      • listAll

        public static java.lang.String listAll()
        Will return a Array list with the list of all the plugins installed in the application [present in the configuration file]
        Returns:
        String containing all the plugins with de supported format and the formats wich are set to default.

      • setDefault

        public static int setDefault(java.lang.String plugin_to_set,
                             java.lang.String format_to_set)
        Will set a plugin to default for the specified format.
        Parameters:
        plugin_to_set - String plugin to set to default
        format_to_set - String format to set to default
        Returns:
        1 if the plugin is already set to default for this format ; 0 if the plugin was successfully set to default for this format ; -1 if the format isn't supported by the plugin, or the format/plugin doesn't exist

      • pluginDetails

        public static java.lang.String pluginDetails(java.lang.String plugin_name,
                                             boolean debug)
        Gives the specifications of the given plugin, used in --help
        Parameters:
        plugin_name - String the name of the plugin.
        debug - true to display debug information
        Returns:
        The plugin specifications.
